resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
The link in the third note is broken here:
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/python.html#build-and-test

It's simply a matter of incorrect rst.
fields.summary: [Docs]Fix broken link in Python Development page

comments.body:
This will solve the problem.

https://github.com/daipom/arrow/commit/261a9245038a0699eecf217fe6105434f0a17526

I would like to send pull request, but this is my first creating issue and I don't have any role,
so I can't assign me.

Could you assign me to the issue?

Hi [~daipom], thank you for noticing!
I think you can make the PR already without having a role. And I will try to assign the issue to you.

Thank you [~alenkaf].

I have made the PR: [https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11620]
